text: Viaŋ 16.1 Sng 69.24, Jer 10.25, Ese 22.31, Sef 3.8, CHL 14.10, 15.1, 15.7, 16.17 igahɨlɨdalɨŋ Asɨ agaŋ nudɨ aŋam ulaŋ hekɨlɨ agadɨ muji heŋ hɨniavɨla nudɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ human limu fɨhala human limu ahica cɨjɨŋ agɨladɨ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ ulavɨla abi uami. Namɨlaŋ hunaŋ mɨsɨn human limu fɨhala human limu ahica cɨjɨŋ agɨladɨ ci via hɨnidalaŋ aba abi uami. Iadɨ igɨvɨ agaŋ lɨmɨn uain agɨladɨ amɨŋ agɨladɨ mɨtɨ me hunaŋ mɨsɨn agɨladɨ hɨvɨ ala hɨniavi aba abi uami. Hunaŋ mɨsɨn agɨladɨ viavɨla lɨmɨn uain agɨladɨ amɨŋ agɨladɨ mɨtɨ avɨli vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ me agadɨ fɨli heŋ mɨŋamɨjidalaŋ mɨguavɨm aba abi uami.
